articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Balatro yet again subject to mods’ poor understanding of “gambling” - Ars Technica
articles.description: YouTube restricts some, but not all, videos depicting the poker-ish indie game.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Second child dies of measles—anti-vaccine advocate reported it before officials - Ars Technica
articles.description: Another tragic death highlights growing power of anti-vaccine advocates.

articles.author: Caitlin Carlson
articles.title: AI is coming to skin cancer detection - The Washington Post
articles.description: Technology is already assisting with diagnoses, but experts predict better tools will become available in the not-too-distant future.
articles.content:
A future where artificial intelligence will guide skin cancer detection is in sight, experts say, even as human care remains essential.
The whole ecosystem has really matured and we are now past the… [+5594 chars]
